message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI 

The paper deals with offline handwritten text line recognition, which involves image processing, computer vision, and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval), which includes topics related to text recognition and retrieval. The paper also uses deep learning techniques, specifically LSTM recurrent neural networks, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper proposes a new framework for combining multiple recognizers, which can be seen as a machine learning problem (cs.LG) and involves optimization techniques. Finally, the paper achieves state-of-the-art performance, which is a common goal in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research.
